Wheel of Destiny Presets

  1. The presets you will find here only cover the key upgrades/breakpoints of the wheel system, as we cannot have a preset for every level.
    If your level is between any two presets, we suggest to simply aim for simple stuff such as +life/resistances, until your next big breakpoint.
  2. If you have a suggestion, or a preset that you use that isn't below, please let us know!
    Reach out to 'Kusnier' on discord or join our server to discuss, discord.gg/f2hESCbgvz
  3. We focus on presets for up to level 1000~, as at that point there are simply too many combinations and by then you should already have enough knowledge/experience to customize your own wheel.
Level Link Revelation Perks Key Conv. Perks Notes
175+ Here N/A +1 skill Can get +1 skill in Avatar quadrant instead
300+ Here T1 Gift of Life N/A Low level hunting
300+ Here T1 Avatar N/A Low level bossing
425+ Here T1 Gift of Life +2 skill N/A
550+ Here T1 Gift of Life, T1 Avatar T2 Exori Mas When boxing 6+ creatures
550+ Here T2 Combat Mastery N/A When boxing under 6 creatures, Bossing
625+ Here T2 Throw +2 skill For finishing smaller boxes
675+ Here T2 Combat Mastery T2 Exori Gran Exori Gran based wheel
700+ Here T1 Gift of Life, T1 Throw T2 Exori Mas Alternative Exori Mas Wheel
725+ Here T1 Gift of Life, T1 Avatar T2 Exori Mas, +3 skill Exori Mas based wheel
875+ Here T2 Gift of Life, T1 Avatar T2 Exori Mas, Battle Instinct Exori Mas based wheel
1175+ Here T2 Combat Mastery, T1 Gift of Life, T1 Avatar T2 Exori Mas, T2 Exori Gran N/A
